noGroupsDescription: Get started by creating your first group to organize your listings.

dialog.deleteGroupDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove the group from all associated listings.
dialog.deleteGroupsDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected group? This action cannot be undone and will remove the group from all associated listings.
dialog.deleteGroupsDescription_plural: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected groups? This action cannot be undone and will remove the groups from all associated listings.
